intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to install and create an instance of the Apache Tomcat server in order to deploy and test your JAX-WS Web service.
If you need help at any step, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Download and install Apache Tomcat
item.description: Download and install Apache Tomcat version 5.5.x or 6.0.x from the following site: http://tomcat.apache.org/. Selecting the "Click to perform" button below will open a web browser at that location.

item.title: Create an Apache Tomcat server
item.description: Perform the following the steps to create a Tomcat server in the workbench.

subitem.label: Select "File -> New -> Other..." from the main menu, expand the "Server" category within the resulting "New Wizard" dialog box and choose "Server". Click "Next >".
Select the version of Tomcat that you have installed on the first page. Click "Next >".
Specify the Tomcat Installation directory and click "Finish".
Open the Servers view by selecting "Window -> Show View -> Other.." from the main menu, expand the "Server" category within the resulting "Show View" dialog box and choose "Servers". Click "OK".
Start the Tomcat server by selecting the server in the Servers view and clicking the "Start the server" button in the Servers view toolbar.
